original_text: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me no meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me no drink:
korean_text: 내가 주릴 때에 너희가 먹을 것을 주지 아니하였고 목마를 때에 마시게 하지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: and ye gave me no meat
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나에게 먹을 것을 주지 않았고

sentences.original_text: and ye gave me no drink
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나에게 마실 것을 주지 않았더라
